en.title: Rs. 280000 Treasury Bills and Bonds auction
body_lines: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (SLTB) has taken measures to hold a auction of Treasury Bonds worth Rs. 13 thousand million and Rs.
Treasury bills of Rs. 62,500 million worth of Rs. 6,000 million worth RsThe Central Bank announced.

(Treasury bill is a short-term debt instrument issued by the Government of Sri Lanka under the local Treasury Bill Act No. 8 of 1923 under the local Treasury Bill Act No. 8 of 1923). A RevisedIs a medieval and long-term loan tool issued by.)

summary_lines: Central Bank Sri Lanka auctions Treasury Bonds Rs. 130 billion, Treasury Bills Rs. 62.5 billion. Short-term debt instruments issued under Treasury Bill Act 1923. Long-term loans also available.
